Name: Battle of Kings VR
About the game: The time of war has come! Battle of Kings is a tower defense strategy game in which you take the command and use your strategic skills to defend the siege against your fortifications. You canâ€™t win only by defending your Kingdom. Develop your economics, assemble and upgrade your army to defeat the enemy forces in a real Battle of Kings. The game features: Campaign mode in which you play classic tower defense scenario Battle mode in which you not only defend your kingdom but also attack the opponent and upgrade economy. Battle PvP Online Multiplayer in which you can test your strategic skill against your friends or other players online. 7 types of towers of different strategic use and each with 3 levels of upgrades. Different environment themes and locations - Lots of possible winning strategies
